attributes.action: Encourage companies and people to buy from UK manufacturers
attributes.background: I would like the government to encourage companies and people to buy from UK manufacturers to help stimulate growth in the economy  through and after the Coronavirus (Covid 19) pandemic. Taking this action can help protect and save people’s jobs whilst growing the UK economy for the benefit of all

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to encourage individuals and businesses to buy from UK manufacturers, but it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to do to achieve this.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to fund a campaign promoting British manufacturers, or create a new public body to promote UK manufacturers domestically, or some other action.
